name: RUN HARE RUN
description:
You play as a loving rabbit named "Roger", your task is not to let your species disappear Rakitnikov’s rabbits, «make happy» as many rabbits as possible in the allotted time. It will not be easy for you because you are in the wild, forest wolves don't mind to regale on rabbits, use your dexterity, you will require not only logic but also speed. Above each hare there is a mood indicator: in a good mood you can make love and conceive offspring, in a neutral mood - you can make love and conceive offspring, but it will take a little longer, in a bad mood - you must feed a hare to a carrot and then you will succeed.

Key game features:
30 unique levels
3 climate zones (as the game progresses): Winter, summer, autumn
